ygData.subject: Fletching
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, way back I knew there was a big stink because it seemed no evil race could fletch. I was wondering if by any chance this has been changed? I am making a DE
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, way back I knew there was a big stink because it seemed no evil race
could fletch. I was wondering if by any chance this has been changed? I am
making a DE SK and I REALLY want to take up archery with him. Archery for me
is one of the main reasons I am choosing SK's. Can someone please please
please please tell me that verant fixed this oversight and there is now a
place to buy fletching materials? I logged on and checked that one place in
neriak and that place is a joke; it only sells nocks.

So is it possible to buy materials not in Kelethin or surefall? Does maybe
Grobb or Oggok have the rest pf the materials? And if it isnt possible maybe
all SK's should feedback this as it essentially makes one of our skills
useless.

Thanks.
